short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official companion extension for JungleReader (www.zajungle.com). This extension allows JungleReader to fetch pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JungleReader is a free and open-source feed-reader  available at www.zajungle.com. You can follow:

- YouTube channels
- Reddit pages
- Mastodon feeds
- RSS feeds
- And more...

JungleReader requires this extension to fetch content from all these sites and show the results in one place.

Getting Started:
Go to JungleReader, at www.zajungle.com and follow the setup guide. It will instruct you to install this extension. JungleReader requires this extension so that it can fetch content from various other websites, like Mastodon, and display their content in the web-app.

Permissions:
When you install the extension, it will ask for access to all your data from all sites. JungleExt requires this permission to be able to create feeds for the various external websites the user wishes to follow on JungleReader. JungleExt does not access things like your history or cookies.

JungleReader and JungleExt are free and open-source, so you are encouraged to inspect the code on GitHub if you have any concerns.
